name: Gravity Desist
description:
Sling away those dang rockets! Gravity assist is actually pretty cool. But not to this planet, apparently.

Submission for 2 Color Game Jam. Themes: "You Are the Weapon" & "Space". Colors used: #e1e1e1 and #000000

Programming & art by ashz
Music by Kevin MacLeod

"Pookatori and Friends" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
